name: LivaNova PLC
description: LivaNova PLC is a global medical technology company focused on developing innovative solutions for the treatment of cardiovascular and neuromodulation conditions. Established in 2015 through the merger of Sorin Group and Cyberonics, LivaNova is dedicated to improving the lives of patients by providing advanced therapies in cardiopulmonary and neurological care. The company offers a range of products, including heart-lung machines, ventricular assist devices, and neuromodulation therapies for epilepsy and depression. LivaNova’s commitment to research and development enables it to continuously innovate and enhance patient care, supporting healthcare professionals with cutting-edge technologies and solutions. With a strong global presence, LivaNova operates in more than 100 countries, ensuring that patients worldwide have access to its life-saving therapies. The company is also focused on sustainable practices and ethical governance, striving to make a positive impact on the healthcare community and society as a whole.
